channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missing sign for Restricted Byway, 11th December
item.description:
No sign of post or sign on Station Road at the entrance to Manor Farm

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Andoversford, Cotswold

item.title: Large series of dangerous potholes are growing, 11th December
item.description:
Very near Church Farm Business Centre - several large potholes. These are bad enough to cause punctures in car tyres.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Large and deep potholes along marsland road, 11th December
item.description:
Deep pot holes along marsland road and some after the traffic calming bump on marsland road and on the bump too, was repaired very recently and has already come apart again. Need a long term solution a full road resurface.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Marsland Road, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
